message

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • message.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The message manager that organizes sending, receiving of messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageManager()
      Runs when message manager is created.

        Get the messages that the user has sent.
        Parameters:
        username - the userName of the user.
        Returns:
        The list of sent messages, in form of a list of Strings, each element is the string form of the Message.

      • getInbox

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInbox(java.lang.String username)
        Get the inbox messages of the user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user that we are looking for.
        Returns:
        The list of inbox messages, the list would include unread messages, in form of a list of Strings, each element is the string form of the Message.

      • sendToList

        public void sendToList(java.lang.String u,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> receivers,
                       java.lang.String text)
        Send a Message to a list of receivers by sender. With the same message text.
        Parameters:
        u - The Username of the sender.
        receivers - The list of Usernames of the receivers.
        text - The message.

      • getAllMessage

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getAllMessage()
        The method used to save all sent Messages in the system. Stores each message in the form of [sender's username, receiver's username, status, message] and put them into a list.
        Returns:
        A list of lists. Each element are in form: [sender's username, receiver's username, status, message]

      • initializeStatus

        public void initializeStatus(int ID,
                             boolean Unread,
                             boolean ReceiverDeleteStatus,
                             boolean ReceiverArchiveStatus,
                             boolean SenderDeleteStatus,
                             boolean SenderArchiveStatus)
        Initialize the message's status.
        Parameters:
        ID - message ID
        Unread - unread status, true for unread.
        ReceiverDeleteStatus - whether the receiver has deleted the message.
        ReceiverArchiveStatus - whether the receiver has archived the message.
        SenderDeleteStatus - whether the sender has delete the message.
        SenderArchiveStatus - whether the sender has archived the message.

      • createMessage

        public int createMessage(java.lang.String sender,
                         java.lang.String receiver,
                         java.lang.String text)
        Create a Message to receiver by sender. With the message text.
        Parameters:
        sender - The Username of the sender.
        receiver - The Username of the receiver.
        text - The message.
        Returns:
        id of the message.
